About the Company: Rama Pulp & Papers Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of various types of papers, mainly cultural and speciality grades.They are also involved in the trade of chemical products. The company primarily serves writing and printing, wrapping and packing, carbonizing, dip dying, and laminating industries.Their product range includes Cream Wove Paper,Multi Layer Carbonizing Paper,MG Tissue Paper,MG Poster Paper,Maplitho Paper,Thermal Paper and Copier Paper.
